quote: I’m not a psychopath, I’m a high functioning sociopath.
about_description: I’m a full-stack and Python developer based in Almaty, Kazakhstan. Just starting my journey in web development, but I approach every project with passion, responsibility, and attention to detail.
about_description2: I aim to turn ideas into clean, modern, and user-friendly web experiences. Constantly learning new tools and technologies to grow as a full-stack developer.
contacts_description: I'm just starting my journey as a developer and open to new projects or collaborations. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to work together or simply connect!
